content:
Currently the nightly docs don't contain hidden or private items.
Since doc comments are written for a lot of internal stuff too it would be nice to have it published somewhere as rustdoc output so they're linkable.

For std I think we shouldn't show private items. That will only confuse people as private items are not clearly indicated and most of them time they are not necessary. If you need them, you can build them yourself.
The way https://stdrs.dev/ does it is to have a big red notice that this is internal documentation. Maybe Rust could separately publish official "dev docs" with a similar notice?

If you need them, you can build them yourself.

My filesystem is not globally distributed, so I can't link to /home/the8472/;)
